alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Fairfield; Franklin; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 8:25PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF FRANKLIN, NORTHWESTERN FAIRFIELD, SOUTHEASTERN DELAWARE AND WESTERN LICKING COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 825 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Marengo to Lake Darby, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Dublin, Westerville, Reynoldsburg, Grove City, Delaware, Upper Arlington, Gahanna, Hilliard, Pickerington, Worthington, Bexley, Granville, Pataskala, Powell, Groveport, Johnstown, Sunbury, Utica and Minerva Park. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 87 and 121. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 100 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
